column3:
Emily and her mother enjoy doing things together often.  Many days they like to go to the park or to the swimming pool but today they chose to go to the grocery store.
ewline
ewlineThey went into the store and straight to look at the fruit. Emily looked at the lemons, the bananas, the apples and the pears.  In the end, Emily chose the apples and put them in a bag.  She handed the bag to her mother to put into their shopping cart.
ewline
ewlineThe pair went to the dairy section next and looked at the kinds of yogurt they store had.  There was blueberry, peach, strawberry and vanilla. Emily asked her mother what kind of yogurt they would be getting and her mother said they wanted the blueberry yogurt.
ewline
ewlineWhen they got to the checkout, Emily helped her mother when they needed to pay.  Emily gave the cashier two dimes and four pennies. 
ewline
ewlineThey gathered up their bags, packed them into their car and drove home.
column4: multiple: What fruit did Emily choose
column9: multiple: What kind of yogurt did Emily choose?
column14: one: Where did Emily and her mother chose to go?
column19: one: How many pennies did Emily give the cashier?
